abstractText: Determine if bank stability is erosional or depositional and evaluate bank stability. These measurements are taken at 11 main and 10 intermediate transects on the left and right banks. Additional plots may be added to increase accuracy. See Appendix H (AIM National Monitoring Framework: Field Protocol for Wadeable Lotic Systems 2021) for additional bank stability considerations for Alaska.
title: Bank Stability based on Erosional Features v2.0
